page.title: 03THE CROSS CHANNEL TUNNEL
page.content:
There would be calls at London,Paris and Brussels but mainly at Cheriton and Sangatte (near Calais).
The proposed cost is between six hundred million and two billion pounds.
The hoped for construction will begin in 1987 and the tunnel would then be opened between 1991 and 1992.Once opened it should take ten to sixteen years to pay for itself.
There would be two hundred and fifty thousand years of employment shared between the United Kingdom and France. Once completed several thousand direct and indirect permanent new jobs will be available.
